question: I found out today I failed my blood glucose test so I have to go back next week for a three hour test. Not to happy about that :( my doctor also mentioned I seemed to be gaining alot of weight fast and thinks my bodyvis retaining alot of fluid. Im switching products with high sodium to lower sodium, but due to insane food prices I cant afford to buy 100% nutrtional food like they want all the time. title: water retention n gluscose fail
